messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw: [organic-gardening] Re: GM Products - Infant formula et al.
messages.msgSnippet: I hate to sound stupid but what are the GM ingredients? ... From: Tracy Oldfield To: Childfun Moms ; Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com ;
messages.messageBody:
I hate to sound stupid but what are the GM ingredients?
----- Original Message -----
From: Tracy Oldfield
To: Childfun Moms ; Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com ; naturalweaners@onelist.com
Sent: Sunday, March 12, 2000 3:25 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw: [organic-gardening] Re: GM Products - Infant formula et al.

From: "Tracy Oldfield" <Tracy@...-online.co.uk>

Someone sent this to an organic gardening list I'm on, thought it might be
of interest...

:-)
Tracy

> Since the topic of GM products in infant formula came up, I thought the
list
> might be interested in products that have been found to contain GM
> ingredients.
>
> The list comes from Greenpeace and Genetic ID, a lab in Idaho that tests
for
> GM products.  Many of these products may not be available in the UK but I
> know there are a fair number of N. Americans on this list who'd like to
> know.
>
> Carnation Alsoy Infant formula
> Similac Isomil Infant formula
> Neocare Infant formula Gardenburger
> Enfamil Prosobee Infant formula
> Heinz 2 Baby Cereal
> General Mills Total Corn Flakes
> Kellogg's Corn Flakes
> Post Blueberry Morning Cereal
>
> Betty Crocker Bac-os Bacon Bits
> Ball Park Franks
> Boca Burger Chef Max's Favourite
> Green Giant Harvest Burgers (now called Morningstar Farms)
> Morningstar Farms Better'n Burgers
> Light Life Gimme Lean
> McDonald's McVeggie Burgers
>
> Mix Bravos Tortilla Chips
> Frito-Lay Fritos Corn Chips
> Old El Paso Taco Shells
> Tostitos Crispy Rounds
> Doritos Nacho Cheesier
>
>
> Aunt Jemima Pancake
> Duncan Hines Cake Mix
> Jiffy Corn Muffin Mix Nabisco
> Snackwell's Granola Bars
> Quaker Yellow Corn Meal
> Quick Loaf Bread Mix
>
> Ultra Slim Fast
> Ovaltine Malt Powdered Beverage Mix
>
> Arzeena
> --------------------------
> Terra Viva Organics
> Looking for organic seed?
> www.tvorganics.com
> ---------------------------
>
